name: Soleil_Agra
content:
Soleil Agra was a Nautolan Jedi Master who sat on the Jedi High Council during the time of the High Republic Era. Agra had yellow skin and black eyes, and wore a set of white and gold Jedi robes. Following the destruction of Starlight Beacon, Agra alongside Grand Masters Pra-Tre Veter and Lahru sent out an urgent transmission on behalf of Grand Master Yoda and the Jedi Council to all Jedi informing them of Starlight Beacon's fall, as well as warning them to avoid the Outer Rim Territories as the Nihil continued their attacks, before finishing the message with a request for the Jedi to regroup on Coruscant.
Created for the Star Wars: The High Republic publishing initiative, Soleil Agra was introduced in the fourth episode of Star Wars: The High Republic Show, released on July 28, 2021. Agra later debuted in the second volume of the manga series Star Wars: The High Republic: The Edge of Balance, written by Shima Shinya and Daniel Jos√© Older, illustrated by Mizuki Sakakibara, and published by Viz Media on February 22, 2022.
